---
title: "Enumerate graphs and partitions"
---

**Enumerate graphs and partitions** is a pdf vignette. At present, pkgdown (the R
package used to create this website) does not support pdf vignettes; see
[pkgdown issue 781](https://github.com/r-lib/pkgdown/issues/781). Please access
**Enumerate graphs and partitions** by installing Pv3Rs and calling
`vignette(topic = "enumerate", package = "Pv3Rs")` in R.
